text.div:
The server supports all operations on the AdverseReaction resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Alert resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the AllergyIntolerance resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Appointment resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the AppointmentResponse resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Availability resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the CarePlan resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Composition resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the ConceptMap resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Condition resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Conformance resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Device resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the DeviceObservationReport resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the DiagnosticOrder resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the DiagnosticReport resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the DocumentManifest resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the DocumentReference resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Encounter resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the FamilyHistory resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Group resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the ImagingStudy resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Immunization resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the ImmunizationRecommendation resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the List resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Location resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Media resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Medication resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the MedicationAdministration resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the MedicationDispense resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the MedicationPrescription resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the MedicationStatement resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the MessageHeader resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Observation resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the OperationOutcome resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Order resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the OrderResponse resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Organization resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Other resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Patient resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Practitioner resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Procedure resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Profile resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Provenance resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Query resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Questionnaire resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the RelatedPerson resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the SecurityEvent resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Slot resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Specimen resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Substance resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Supply resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the ValueSet resource, including history

The server supports all operations on the Binary resource, including history

name: Spark FHIR demo server
description: Conformance statement for the Spark FHIR demo server running at AppHarbor

implementation.description: Furore Spark FHIR demo server running at AppHarbor

rest.documentation: Publicly available, no security, use only for TESTING.

searchParam.name: substance
searchParam.documentation: The name or code of the substance that produces the sensitivity

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the sensitivity is about

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The date of the reaction

searchParam.name: symptom
searchParam.documentation: One of the symptoms of the reaction

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a subject to list alerts for

searchParam.name: substance
searchParam.documentation: The name or code of the substance that produces the sensitivity

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The status of the sensitivity

searchParam.name: recorder
searchParam.documentation: Who recorded the sensitivity

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the sensitivity is about

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Recorded date/time.

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: The type of sensitivity

searchParam.name: partstatus
searchParam.documentation: The Participation status of the subject, or other participant on the appointment

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The overall status of the appointment

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the sensitivity is about

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Appointment date/time.

searchParam.name: partstatus
searchParam.documentation: The overall status of the appointment

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the appointment response replies for

searchParam.name: appointment
searchParam.documentation: The appointment that the response is attached to

searchParam.name: individual
searchParam.documentation: The individual to find an availability for

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: slottype
searchParam.documentation: The type of appointments that can be booked into associated slot(s)

searchParam.name: activitycode
searchParam.documentation: Detail type of activity

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who care plan is for

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: condition
searchParam.documentation: Health issues this plan addresses

searchParam.name: activitydetail
searchParam.documentation: Activity details defined in specific resource

searchParam.name: activitydate
searchParam.documentation: Specified date occurs within period specified by CarePlan.activity.timingSchedule

searchParam.name: participant
searchParam.documentation: Who is involved

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Time period plan covers

searchParam.name: author
searchParam.documentation: Who/what authored the composition

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: attester
searchParam.documentation: Who attested the composition

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Who/what the composition is about

searchParam.name: section-content
searchParam.documentation: The actual data for the section

searchParam.name: context
searchParam.documentation: Code(s) that apply to the event being documented

searchParam.name: class
searchParam.documentation: Categorisation of Composition

searchParam.name: section-type
searchParam.documentation: Classification of section (recommended)

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: Kind of composition (LOINC if possible)

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Logical identifier of composition (version-independent)

searchParam.name: instant
searchParam.documentation: Composition editing time

searchParam.name: product
searchParam.documentation: Reference to element/field/valueset provides the context

searchParam.name: dependson
searchParam.documentation: Reference to element/field/valueset provides the context

searchParam.name: system
searchParam.documentation: The system for any destination concepts mapped by this map

searchParam.name: source
searchParam.documentation: The system for any concepts mapped by this concept map

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Status of the concept map

searchParam.name: description
searchParam.documentation: Text search in the description of the concept map

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: Name of the concept map

searchParam.name: target
searchParam.documentation: Provides context to the mappings

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The concept map publication date

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The identifier of the concept map

searchParam.name: publisher
searchParam.documentation: Name of the publisher of the concept map

searchParam.name: version
searchParam.documentation: The version identifier of the concept map

searchParam.name: asserter
searchParam.documentation: Person who asserts this condition

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The status of the condition

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: Location - may include laterality

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Who has the condition?

searchParam.name: onset
searchParam.documentation: When the Condition started (if started on a date)

searchParam.name: evidence
searchParam.documentation: Manifestation/symptom

searchParam.name: severity
searchParam.documentation: The severity of the condition

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Code for the condition

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: Encounter when condition first asserted

searchParam.name: date-asserted
searchParam.documentation: When first detected/suspected/entered

searchParam.name: stage
searchParam.documentation: Simple summary (disease specific)

searchParam.name: related-code
searchParam.documentation: Relationship target by means of a predefined code

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: The category of the condition

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: related-item
searchParam.documentation: Relationship target resource

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The current status of the conformance statement

searchParam.name: resource
searchParam.documentation: Name of a resource mentioned in a conformance statement

searchParam.name: security
searchParam.documentation: Information about security of implementation

searchParam.name: format
searchParam.documentation: formats supported (xml | json | mime type)

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The conformance statement publication date

searchParam.name: mode
searchParam.documentation: Mode - restful (server/client) or messaging (sender/receiver)

searchParam.name: version
searchParam.documentation: The version identifier of the conformance statement

searchParam.name: publisher
searchParam.documentation: Name of the publisher of the conformance statement

searchParam.name: software
searchParam.documentation: Part of a the name of a software application

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: description
searchParam.documentation: Text search in the description of the conformance statement

searchParam.name: event
searchParam.documentation: Event code in a conformance statement

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: Name of the conformance statement

searchParam.name: supported-profile
searchParam.documentation: Profiles supported by the system

searchParam.name: fhirversion
searchParam.documentation: The version of FHIR

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: The identifier of the conformance statement

searchParam.name: profile
searchParam.documentation: A profile id invoked in a conformance statement

searchParam.name: organization
searchParam.documentation: The organization responsible for the device

searchParam.name: model
searchParam.documentation: The model of the device

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: If the resource is affixed to a person

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: Where the resource is found

searchParam.name: manufacturer
searchParam.documentation: The manufacturer of the device

searchParam.name: udi
searchParam.documentation: FDA Mandated Unique Device Identifier

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: The type of the device

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Instance id from manufacturer, owner and others

searchParam.name: observation
searchParam.documentation: The data for the metric

searchParam.name: source
searchParam.documentation: Identifies/describes where the data came from

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Subject of the measurement

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: The compatment code

searchParam.name: channel
searchParam.documentation: The channel code

searchParam.name: orderer
searchParam.documentation: Who ordered the test

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: requested | received | accepted | in progress | review | completed | suspended | rejected | failed

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Who/what test is about

searchParam.name: item-status
searchParam.documentation: requested | received | accepted | in progress | review | completed | suspended | rejected | failed

searchParam.name: event-status
searchParam.documentation: requested | received | accepted | in progress | review | completed | suspended | rejected | failed

searchParam.name: actor
searchParam.documentation: Who recorded or did this

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Code to indicate the item (test or panel) being ordered

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: The encounter that this diagnostic order is associated with

searchParam.name: item-past-status
searchParam.documentation: requested | received | accepted | in progress | review | completed | suspended | rejected | failed

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: bodysite
searchParam.documentation: Location of requested test (if applicable)

searchParam.name: item-date
searchParam.documentation: The date at which the event happened

searchParam.name: specimen
searchParam.documentation: If the whole order relates to specific specimens

searchParam.name: event-status-date
searchParam.documentation: A combination of past-status and date

searchParam.name: event-date
searchParam.documentation: The date at which the event happened

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Identifiers assigned to this order

searchParam.name: item-status-date
searchParam.documentation: A combination of item-past-status and item-date

searchParam.name: result
searchParam.documentation: Link to an atomic result (observation resource)

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: The status of the report

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject of the report

searchParam.name: issued
searchParam.documentation: When the report was issued

searchParam.name: diagnosis
searchParam.documentation: A coded diagnosis on the report

searchParam.name: image
searchParam.documentation: Reference to the image source

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The clinically relevant time of the report

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: request
searchParam.documentation: What was requested

searchParam.name: specimen
searchParam.documentation: The specimen details

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: The name of the report (e.g. the code for the report as a whole, as opposed to codes for the atomic results, which are the names on the observation resource referred to from the result)

searchParam.name: service
searchParam.documentation: Which diagnostic discipline/department created the report

searchParam.name: performer
searchParam.documentation: Who was the source of the report (organization)

searchParam.name: group
searchParam.documentation: Name /code of a group in the report

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: An identifier for the report

searchParam.name: content
searchParam.documentation: Contents of this set of documents

searchParam.name: author
searchParam.documentation: Who/what authored the document

searchParam.name: supersedes
searchParam.documentation: If this document manifest replaces another

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: current | superceded | entered in error

searchParam.name: created
searchParam.documentation: When this document manifest created

searchParam.name: confidentiality
searchParam.documentation: Sensitivity of set of documents

searchParam.name: description
searchParam.documentation: Human-readable description (title)

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject of the set of documents

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: What kind of document set this is

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Unique Identifier for the set of documents

searchParam.name: recipient
searchParam.documentation: Intended to get notified about this set of documents

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: Where to access the document

searchParam.name: indexed
searchParam.documentation: When this document reference created

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: current | superceded | entered in error

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Who|what is the subject of the document

searchParam.name: relatesto
searchParam.documentation: Target of the relationship

searchParam.name: relation
searchParam.documentation: replaces | transforms | signs | appends

searchParam.name: class
searchParam.documentation: Categorisation of Document

searchParam.name: format
searchParam.documentation: Format/content rules for the document

searchParam.name: period
searchParam.documentation: Time of service that is being documented

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: What kind of document this is (LOINC if possible)

searchParam.name: authenticator
searchParam.documentation: Who/What authenticated the document

searchParam.name: size
searchParam.documentation: Size of the document in bytes

searchParam.name: relationship
searchParam.documentation: Combination of relation and relatesTo

searchParam.name: author
searchParam.documentation: Who/what authored the document

searchParam.name: custodian
searchParam.documentation: Org which maintains the document

searchParam.name: facility
searchParam.documentation: Kind of facility where patient was seen

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: created
searchParam.documentation: Document creation time

searchParam.name: event
searchParam.documentation: Main Clinical Acts Documented

searchParam.name: confidentiality
searchParam.documentation: Sensitivity of source document

searchParam.name: description
searchParam.documentation: Human-readable description (title)

searchParam.name: language
searchParam.documentation: The marked primary language for the document

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Master Version Specific Identifier

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: The location the encounter takes place

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: planned | in progress | onleave | finished | cancelled

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The patient present at the encounter

searchParam.name: indication
searchParam.documentation: Reason the encounter takes place (resource)

searchParam.name: length
searchParam.documentation: Length of encounter in days

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: A date within the period the Encounter lasted

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Identifier(s) by which this encounter is known

searchParam.name: location-period
searchParam.documentation: Time period during which the patient was present at the location

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a subject to list family history items for

searchParam.name: member
searchParam.documentation: Who is in group

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: characteristic-value
searchParam.documentation: A composite of both characteristic and value

searchParam.name: value
searchParam.documentation: Value held by characteristic

searchParam.name: actual
searchParam.documentation: Descriptive or actual

searchParam.name: exclude
searchParam.documentation: Group includes or excludes

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: The kind of resources contained

searchParam.name: characteristic
searchParam.documentation: Kind of characteristic

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: The type of resources the group contains

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Unique id

searchParam.name: uid
searchParam.documentation: Formal identifier for this instance (0008,0018)

searchParam.name: series
searchParam.documentation: The series id for the image

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: bodysite
searchParam.documentation: Body part examined (Map from 0018,0015)

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Who the study is about

searchParam.name: accession
searchParam.documentation: The accession id for the image

searchParam.name: study
searchParam.documentation: The study id for the image

searchParam.name: modality
searchParam.documentation: The modality of the image

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: The date the study was done was taken

searchParam.name: dicom-class
searchParam.documentation: DICOM class type (0008,0016)

searchParam.name: size
searchParam.documentation: The size of the image in MB - may include > or < in the value

searchParam.name: reaction
searchParam.documentation: Additional information on reaction

searchParam.name: requester
searchParam.documentation: The practitioner who ordered the vaccination

searchParam.name: dose-sequence
searchParam.documentation: What dose number within series?

searchParam.name: vaccine-type
searchParam.documentation: Vaccine Product Type Administered

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: The service delivery location or facility in which the vaccine was / was to be administered

searchParam.name: reason
searchParam.documentation: Why immunization occurred

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject of the vaccination event / refusal

searchParam.name: reaction-date
searchParam.documentation: When did reaction start?

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Vaccination  Administration / Refusal Date

searchParam.name: lot-number
searchParam.documentation: Vaccine Lot Number

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: manufacturer
searchParam.documentation: Vaccine Manufacturer

searchParam.name: performer
searchParam.documentation: The practitioner who administered the vaccination

searchParam.name: refused
searchParam.documentation: Was immunization refused?

searchParam.name: refusal-reason
searchParam.documentation: Explanation of refusal / exemption

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Business identifier

searchParam.name: information
searchParam.documentation: Patient observations supporting recommendation

searchParam.name: dose-sequence
searchParam.documentation: Number of dose within sequence

searchParam.name: support
searchParam.documentation: Past immunizations supporting recommendation

searchParam.name: vaccine-type
searchParam.documentation: Vaccine recommendation applies to

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Vaccine administration status

searchParam.name: dose-number
searchParam.documentation: Recommended dose number

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Who this profile is for

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Date recommendation created

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Business identifier

searchParam.name: source
searchParam.documentation: Who/what defined the list contents

searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: If all resources have the same subject

searchParam.name: item
searchParam.documentation: Actual entry

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: What the purpose of this list is

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: When the list was prepared

searchParam.name: empty-reason
searchParam.documentation: Why list is empty

searchParam.name: near
searchParam.documentation: The coordinates expressed as [lat],[long] (using KML, see notes) to find locations near to (servers may search using a square rather than a circle for efficiency)

searchParam.name: partof
searchParam.documentation: The location of which this location is a part

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Searches for locations with a specific kind of status

searchParam.documentation: A (part of the) address of the location

searchParam.documentation: A (portion of the) name of the location

searchParam.name: near-distance
searchParam.documentation: A distance quantity to limit the near search to locations within a specific distance

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: A code for the type of location

searchParam.name: identifier
searchParam.documentation: Unique code or number identifying the location to its users

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The logical resource id associated with the resource (must be supported by all servers)

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Who/What this Media is a record of

searchParam.name: subtype
searchParam.documentation: The type of acquisition equipment/process

searchParam.name: view
searchParam.documentation: Imaging view e.g Lateral or Antero-posterior

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: When the media was taken/recorded (end)

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: photo | video | audio

searchParam.name: identifier

searchParam.name: operator
searchParam.documentation: The person who generated the image

searchParam.name: content
searchParam.documentation: A product in the package

searchParam.name: form
searchParam.documentation: powder | tablets | carton +

searchParam.name: container
searchParam.documentation: E.g. box, vial, blister-pack

searchParam.name: name

searchParam.documentation: Date when medication prepared

searchParam.documentation: Date when medication handed over to patient (outpatient setting), or supplied to ward or clinic (inpatient setting)

searchParam.documentation: Return dispenses that should be sent to a secific destination

searchParam.name: medication
searchParam.documentation: Code for medicine or text in medicine name
